snippet: Toby, the rat kept by the teenager with autism in “The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time,” is so popular her role has been expanded.
abstract: Toby, name of rat kept by teenager with autism at center of play The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time, is a female but plays a male in the play; affable albino has not only managed to wrap most of the cast and crew of the show around her long, tapered tail, she has also won the affection of audiences, so much so that her rodent role has been expanded.
lead_paragraph: Toby, the rat kept by the teenager with autism in “The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time,” is so popular her role has been expanded.

headline.seo: 'The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time' Has an Unexpected Star: A Rat Named Toby
headline.main: White Rodent Finds Fame on the Great White Way
headline.print_headline: A White Rat Finds Fame on the Great White Way
